name: The Eve of Christmas Eve
description:
Be quiet, impress Santa and feed the Tree to pass your annual trial.

Move in silence, sneak and use the perimeter of the room to make less noise. If you are too loud, you must find a closet to hide in before he finds you. 

Merry Christmas.

Controls:
  • WASD/Arrow Keys - Movement
  • Shift - Sprint
  • Control - Sneak
  • Spacebar - Interact
  • R - Restart
  • Escape - Exit
Follow me on Twitter @heavymaterial for updates.
